entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story. Harry is mentioned as reacting to an announcement about Eileen Prince and her son Tobias Snape.

entities.name: eileen prince
entities.description: Eileen Prince is mentioned in an announcement about marrying a man called Tobias Snape. She later gives birth to a child.

entities.name: tobias snape
entities.description: Tobias Snape is the son of Eileen Prince and a Muggle man. He is mentioned in an announcement about his mother's marriage and later as being referred to by Harry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a character who reacts to the news about Eileen Prince and her son Tobias Snape.

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy is mentioned as being related to Tobias Snape through his marriage with Narcissa (not explicitly stated in this text but known from the Harry Potter series).

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a character who is criticized by Harry for trusting Tobias Snape.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as being similar to Tobias Snape in terms of his background and behavior.

relationships.description: Harry criticizes Dumbledore for trusting Tobias Snape.
Tobias Snape is compared to Voldemort in terms of his background and behavior.
Harry has a conversation with Hermione about Eileen Prince and her son Tobias Snape.
Tobias Snape is related to Lucius Malfoy through his marriage with Narcissa (not explicitly stated in this text but known from the Harry Potter series).
